scripts.deploy: npm run build && powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ./docs; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path ./docs; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force ./dist/assets ./docs/; Copy-Item -Force ./dist/index.html ./docs/; Copy-Item -Force ./dist/favicon.png ./docs/; Copy-Item -Force ./dist/robots.txt ./docs/; Copy-Item -Force ./dist/sitemap.xml ./docs/"
